name: Actors Company of Tulsa, Inc.
tag_list: theatre, shows, plays, school, drama, art, tulsa
overview:
Our company educates the Tulsa theatrical artist, connects with local business and the community and produces quality theatre that entertains, informs and enlightens the city of Tulsa and the world.

Our chief things that we do are: -Produce 5 shows a year that give 20% of their ticket revenue to worthwhile organizations. -Create process content and backstage video for a paralell service called All ACTsess which creates a conversation for the audience and the actor. -Produce special events and new works that will create products -Sell merchandise and products that are based around our brand, our ensemble and our shows. -Establish an educational program for the young adult artist that will provide training and technique for the Tulsa actor.
